title: Beautiful Corner Apartment w/ Pool View at Los Feliz Bliss
posting_body: ['Welcome to your new home at Los Feliz Bliss Apartments in Los Angeles, CA!', 'Nestled in the heart of Los Angeles, Los Feliz Bliss offers all the rewards and comforts of high-class living at an affordable price.', 'Whether it be a relaxing night of beautiful Los Angeles views or a night out on the town, Los Feliz Bliss gives you the neighborhood you’re looking for at the price you want.', 'We offer pet-friendly, 1-bedroom floor plans just minutes from Los Angeles’s finest shopping and dining, you get the benefits of city living, combined with comforting amenities.', 'Peruse our photo gallery and see for yourself why Los Feliz Bliss should be your next home.', 'Contact Los Feliz Bliss or Schedule a Tour today!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 45', 'OR Text', '45', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Fireplace', '- Weather Forecaster with Color Display', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Quartz Counter top', '- Balcony with Ceiling Fan', '- Bluetooth Ceiling Fan/Mood Light/Unit Lighting/Speaker', '- Plank Flooring', '- Sundeck', '- Newly Renovated Units Available', '- Stainless Steel Appliance Package', '- Dishwasher', 'Community Amenities', '- 24 Hours Laundry Facilities', '- Fitness Center', '- Gated Entry', '- Private Dog Areas', '- Gas, Water, Trash, Sewer Included', '- Garage with Assigned Parking', '- Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'Maximum of 2 pets allowed per unit.', 'Max of 50lb pet pet weight restriction.', 'Breed restrictions applies.', '$300 Per Deposit and $50 Monthly Pet Rent per pet.', 'Driving Directions', 'Previously known as Parkwood Apartments.', 'Adjacent to the Chevron gas station on Los Feliz Blvd.', 'Cross streets are Vermont Ave and Hillhurst Ave.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Los Feliz Bliss Apartments', '4646 Los Feliz Blvd, Los Angeles, CA, 90027', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'AclISU6m4jC']
